height.description: Height of the bar this label belongs to.

hidden.description: If true, the bar label is hidden.

placement.description: The placement of the bar label. It controls whether the label is rendered in the center or outside the bar.

width.description: Width of the bar this label belongs to.

x.description: Position in the x-axis of the bar this label belongs to.

xOrigin.description: The x-coordinate of the stack this bar label belongs to.

y.description: Position in the y-axis of the bar this label belongs to.

yOrigin.description: The y-coordinate of the stack this bar label belongs to.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

series.description: Styles applied to {{nodeName}}. Needs to be suffixed with the series ID: .${barLabelClasses.series}-${seriesId}.
series.nodeName: the root element for a specified series

slotDescriptions.barLabel: The component that renders the bar label.
